introductionText1: Hey clever mind, ready to spark?
introductionText3: Unleash the AI magic, any time any where, day & night.
thisTemplateIsOnlyAvailableForPremiumUse: This template is only available for premium users
languageMoreInformationOptional:
The language section is optional

You don’t need to select a language here. Here’s how it works:
• If you choose a language, the generated results will be in that language

• If you don’t choose one, the app will use its default language (your app’s current language setting) or input content language (Based on the AI mode you are working on)
aiModelMoreInformationOptional:
AI Model Selection is Optional

You can choose an AI model to power your results, or let the app pick one for you. Here’s what you need to know:
• The AI model defines the engine behind your generated content
• For example, Gemini-2.5-flash is versatile and great for almost any task

• If you don’t select a model, the app uses a reliable default—no worries needed!
roleMoreInformationOptional:
Roles are Completely Optional

Roles help shape the tone and style of your generated results. Here’s the scoop:
• Selecting a role makes the output more specific to that perspective (e.g., a teacher, an engineer, a student)

• Skip this, and the app applies a general-purpose default role—still great results!
speechLevelMoreInformation:
Speech Level is Up to You

This controls how wordy your output is. You can pick a level or leave it alone:
• Very Silent: Around 150 words
• Silent: Around 250 words
• Reserved: Around 350 words

• Moderate: Around 500 words
• Chatty: Around 650 words
• Very Chatty: Around 900 words

• No selection? The app uses a balanced default (Moderate, ~500 words)—perfectly fine!
temperatureMoreInformationOptional:
Temperature is Optional

Temperature tweaks how precise or creative your results are. Here’s how it works:
• Lower values (closer to Logic) make output more accurate and focused
• Higher values (closer to Creativity) make it more imaginative

• Don’t set it? The app picks a middle-ground default—accurate yet flexible!
templateMoreInformationOptional:
Templates are Totally Optional

Templates give your text file outputs a polished structure. Here’s why they’re cool:
• Pick a template to infuse your results with unique vibes and stunning UI styles
• They’re game-changers, transforming your user interfaces with fresh, creative flair
• Crafted entirely by humans, they’re sleek, efficient, and packed with personality
• Some are premium exclusives, while others are free for all to enjoy

• If you skip choosing one, the app applies a simple, clean default format—still sharp and effective!
outputTypeMoreInformationOptional:
Output Type is Totally Optional

You decide how your results show up—or skip it and let us handle it! Here’s the scoop:
• Pick an output type, and we’ll shape your results to fit, based on the AI mode:
  • **Text File Mode**: Grab options like PDF, DOCX, Notepad (.txt), or others—perfect for saving or tweaking
  • **Image-Based Results**: Choose PNG, JPEG, or more image formats—great for stunning visuals
  • **Audio Outputs**: Go with MP3 or other audio formats—awesome for listening
  • **And Beyond**: Yep, there might be even more options depending on the mode—endless possibilities!

• Don’t pick one? No problem! The app picks a slick default for you, tailored to the mode—easy and effective!

Your output, your rules—play with it however you want!
ExceedingFiveTitleSubmissionsRequiresAPa: Exceeding 5 title submissions requires a paid plan. Subscribe to premium to add up to 10 titles.
maximumLengthIsReachedSubscribeToPremium: Maximum length is reached. subscribe to premium plan to type more.
translateTextInputMoreInformationRequire:
Text Input is Required

This is where it all begins! You need to provide the text you want to translate. Here’s what you should know:
• Enter the text you want to translate in this field
• Make sure it’s clear and concise for the best results

Without this, we can’t work our translation magic!
imageQualityMoreInformationOptional:
Image Quality is Optional

You can fine-tune the quality of your image outputs, or let us handle it. Here’s the deal:
• Use the slider to adjust the quality level—slide towards higher quality for more detail, or lower for smaller files

• If you don’t adjust it, we’ll use a default setting that works great for most cases
needDescriptionMoreInformationOptional:
Need Description is Optional

This lets you decide if you want the AI to explain its reasoning. Here’s how it works:
• Set to true, and you’ll get a detailed breakdown of how the AI arrived at its answer
• Set to false or skip it, and you’ll just get the final result

It’s your call—dig deeper or keep it simple!
flowchartDescriptionMoreInformationRequi:
Flowchart Description is Required

This is the heart of your flowchart! You need to provide a description to create it. Here’s what you should know:
• Enter a clear description of the process or idea you want turned into a flowchart
• Be specific—details help us craft an accurate and useful diagram

Without this, we can’t build your flowchart masterpiece!
typeYourImaginationToConvertToFlowchart: Type your imagination to convert to flowchart
languageMoreInformationRequired:
Language Selection is Required

You need to choose the language you want your final result be.
• Pick the one language that suits your needs

Don’t forget to choose a language, or we won’t know where to start!
whatYouHaveInYourKitchen: What you have in your kitchen
whatYouDontHaveInYourKitchen: What you don't have in your kitchen
placeYourDreamTextToConvertToPixelsHintT: surrealism-style image of an endless library where books fly like birds, their pages forming staircases that lead to unknown worlds hidden inside their covers, from a wide-angle panoramic perspective, with soft candlelit illumination casting shifting shadows that move on their own. The ceiling dissolves into a swirling galaxy, where stories take physical form and drift through the air.
turnOffSurpriseMeIfYouWantToTypeInHere: Turn off 'Surprise me' if you want to type in here
needSummarizationMoreInformationOptional:
Need Summarization is Optional

Decide if you want the AI to provide a summary of the generated content. Here’s how it works:
• If you set this to true, you'll get a concise summary along with the main result.
• If you set it to false or skip it, you'll only receive the main generated content.

It's a handy way to quickly grasp the key takeaways!
convertDreamToPixelInputMoreInformationR:
Dream Description is Required

To bring your dream to life as an image, you need to describe it! Here’s what to do:
• Provide a detailed and vivid description of the dream you envision.
• The more details you include (like setting, characters, emotions, and actions), the better the AI can interpret and generate your dream image.

Let your imagination run wild and tell us what you dreamed!
imageVibeMoreInformationOptional:
Image Vibe is Optional

This setting lets you add a specific theme or style to your generated images, giving them a unique feel. Think of it as adding a 'soul' to your image.

• For example, if you select 'Halloween', expect images with spooky elements like pumpkins, ghosts, dark and eerie settings, and perhaps a touch of the macabre.

Feel free to experiment with different vibes to get the exact look you're after!
enhancePromptMoreInformationOptional:
Enhance Prompt is Optional

Let the AI refine your input to potentially get even better results! Here’s how it works:
• If you choose to enhance the prompt, the AI will analyze your original text and might add details or rephrase it to improve clarity and guide the generation process.

• If you skip this, the AI will use your prompt exactly as you wrote it.

Try it out to see if it makes a difference!
recipeCountMoreInformationOptional:
Recipe Count is Optional

Decide how many recipe suggestions you'd like the AI to generate. Here’s what you can do:
• Specify the number of recipes you want (e.g., '3' for three different recipes).

• If you don't specify a number, the app will provide a default number of suggestions.

Perfect for when you want variety or just a single idea!
mealModeMoreInformationOptional:
Choose Your Meal Mode (Optional)

Select a meal mode to get recipe suggestions that align with your budget. Here are the options:

• **Penny Pantry:** Recipes focused on being budget-friendly and using inexpensive ingredients.
• **Daily Dish:** Everyday recipes that balance cost and flavor, suitable for regular meals.
• **Gourmet Glow:** Recipes that may involve more premium ingredients or elaborate techniques for a special or higher-end dining experience.

Choose the mode that best fits how much you're looking to spend on your meal!
familyMembersMoreInformationOptional:
Family Members is Optional

Let us know how many people you're cooking for to help tailor the recipe quantities. Here’s how it helps:
• Indicate the number of family members or people you'll be serving (e.g., '2', '4', '6').

• If you don't specify, the AI will likely provide recipes for a standard serving size.

Ensure everyone gets just the right amount!
smartDBDescriptionMoreInformationRequire:
Database Description is Required

To create your smart database, we need to understand what it should do! Here’s what you need to provide:
• Describe the purpose and structure of the database you want to create. Be specific about the type of information it should store and how it should be organized.
• For example, you might say: 'Create a database to track customer orders, including customer details, order dates, and items purchased.'

The more details, the better we can build your smart database!
dbmsMoreInformationRequired:
Database Management System (DBMS) Selection is Required

You need to choose a specific database system to be used for your smart database. Here’s what to consider:
• Selecting a DBMS is essential as it defines the underlying technology that will manage your database.

Without selecting a DBMS, we cannot proceed with creating your smart database schema.
whatYouHaveInYourKitchenMoreInformationR:
Unlock delicious possibilities!

To find the perfect recipe for you, please tell us what ingredients you currently have in your kitchen.

• Simply list the items you'd like to use.

We're excited to help you create something amazing!
whatYouDontHaveInYourKitchenMoreInformat:
Skip Ingredients? (Optional)

Want to avoid recipes that call for specific ingredients you don't have? You can list them here.

• This step is optional, but it can save you time by ensuring the suggested recipes only include ingredients you possess.

Tell us what to skip, and we'll take care of the rest!
difficultyLevelMoreInformation:
Choose a Difficulty Level

Pick the challenge level that fits your needs best! This setting determines how tough the questions in your quiz will be:
• **Novice (Easy):** Great for beginners or a quick refresher.
• **Adept (Normal):** A balanced level for most learners.
• **Master (Hard):** Designed to truly test your knowledge.

Choose wisely — the AI will tailor the exam difficulty accordingly!
includeAnswerMoreInformationOptional:
Include Answers? (Optional)

Decide whether you'd like the AI to provide answers along with your quiz.
• If enabled, you'll receive a separate file containing the correct answers for each question.
• If disabled, you’ll only get the quiz content without solutions.

Useful for self-checking, grading, or just peace of mind!
quizTypeMoreInformationRequired:
Quiz Type is Required

Tell the AI what subject or field the quiz should focus on. This helps it generate accurate and relevant questions.
• For example: 'English grammar', 'German vocabulary', 'Basic math', or 'World history'.

The more specific you are, the better your quiz will match your expectations!
quizModeMoreInformationOptional:
Choose Your Quiz Mode (Optional)

Select how you want your quiz to be formatted — ideal for how you plan to use it:
• **Digital:** Adds interactive features like clickable choices or text fields. Great for screens!
• **Paper:** A clean, printable layout with no extra components. Perfect for physical exams.

Pick the mode that fits your delivery style!
whatDoYouWishToLearn: What do you wish to learn
whatDoYouWishToLearnMoreInformationRequi:
What Do You Wish to Learn is Required

Kickstart your learning adventure by telling us your goals! Here’s what to do:
• Share the specific topic or skill you want to explore, like 'learning Python programming' or 'understanding medieval art history.'
• Be as detailed as possible to help the AI recommend the best resources, such as books, videos, or online courses, tailored to your interests.

The clearer your input, the more precise and helpful your resource list will be!
planForLearningMoreInformationOptional:
Plan for Learning is Optional

Want a roadmap to guide your learning? Here’s how it works:
• Enable this toggle to receive a personalized learning plan alongside your resource recommendations.
• The plan will include a structured timeline, key milestones, and study tasks to keep you on track, like 'Watch a CSS tutorial this week' or 'Read chapter one by Friday.'
• If you skip this, you’ll get only the curated resources without a plan.

Toggle it on for a clear path to success!

podcastFormatMoreInformationRequired:
Choose the structure that best fits your podcast idea:

• Interview – One or more hosts ask questions to a guest. Great for expert insights or personal stories.
• Monologue – A solo host shares thoughts, stories, or commentary. Ideal for deep dives or personal updates.
• Co-hosted – Two or more regular hosts share conversations and perspectives. Adds chemistry and variety.
• Panel – A group of guests discuss a topic, often moderated. Works well for expert discussions or debates.
• Storytelling – Narrated stories, either real or fictional. Great for building atmosphere or emotional impact.
• Educational – Focused on teaching or explaining concepts. Perfect for how-tos, courses, or expert breakdowns.
• News Roundup – Summarizes recent events or headlines. Great for keeping audiences informed.
• Q&A – Hosts answer listener-submitted questions. Interactive and community-driven.
• Debate – Opposing viewpoints on a topic. Encourages critical thinking and audience engagement.
• Documentary – In-depth, research-based exploration of real events or issues. Ideal for serious, factual storytelling.
• Fiction – Fully imagined stories with characters and plots. Like audio dramas or sci-fi adventures.
• Hybrid – A mix of formats (e.g., interviews + storytelling). Offers flexibility and variety in presentation.
podcastToneMoreInformationRequired:
Select the tone that sets the mood for your podcast:

• Serious – Focused, professional, and respectful. Best for informative or sensitive topics.
• Funny – Lighthearted, entertaining, and humorous. Great for comedy, casual talk, or satire.
• Inspirational – Uplifting and motivating. Perfect for stories of growth, resilience, or life lessons.
• Casual – Relaxed and conversational. Feels like chatting with a friend.
• Dramatic – Intense and expressive. Good for storytelling, fiction, or emotional topics.
• Emotional – Evokes strong feelings. Suitable for personal stories or heartfelt moments.
• Neutral – Balanced and unbiased. Ideal for news, summaries, or factual discussion.
• Motivational – Encourages action and positive change. Great for self-help or coaching themes.
• Sarcastic – Uses irony or wit. Works well for comedic or edgy content.
• Romantic – Focuses on love and relationships. Suitable for dating, fiction, or themed stories.
• Mysterious – Creates suspense or intrigue. Ideal for thrillers, true crime, or paranormal topics.
• Uplifting – Positive and feel-good. Great for encouraging, warm, or celebratory episodes.
podcastScenarioModelMoreInformationOptio: The podcast scenario model is an optional tool that helps shape the overall structure, setting, or context of your podcast episode. It provides the voice generation model with a clearer direction, making the output more aligned with a specific creative vision. If you don’t select one, the system will automatically choose the best scenario based on your chosen format and tone.

footerText: AxonNegar © 2025 — A next-generation AI agent crafted to empower you in every context. Built with multiple intelligent modes, AxonNegar seamlessly adapts to creativity, productivity, research, and problem-solving, giving you the right tools at the right moment. Designed in 2025 with a vision for the future, it bridges the gap between human potential and artificial intelligence—helping you explore ideas, streamline tasks, and push the boundaries of innovation. Wherever intelligence is needed, AxonNegar is your trusted companion in the age of smart technology.
comparisonRowCountMoreInformationRequire:
Select the number of criteria (rows) to generate for the comparison. This controls the depth of the analysis.

• Fewer Rows: Creates a concise, high-level summary focusing on the most critical differences. Ideal for a quick overview.

• More Rows: Produces a detailed, in-depth table that compares a wide range of features and nuances. Use this to make a more thorough and informed decision.

typeAnOverviewOfTheScenarioYouHaveInMind: Type an overview of the scenario you have in mind
An upbeat and energetic intro for a weekly tech podcast called 'Tech Forward'.
A conversational and trustworthy mid-roll ad read for a meal delivery service.
A serious and dramatic narration for a true-crime podcast segment, detailing the events of a cold case.
A warm and friendly call-to-action for the end of the show, asking listeners to rate, review, and follow on social media.
A professional and respectful introduction for an interview guest, highlighting their expertise as a leading scientist.
The voice of a mysterious old detective character in a fictional audio drama, reading from his journal.
A smooth, professional transition voice-over saying: 'And now, for our listener mail segment...'
A clear and engaging voice for an educational podcast, explaining a complex historical event.
A formal and neutral voice reading a legal disclaimer for a financial advice podcast.
A lighthearted and curious voice for reading a listener's question aloud during a Q&A segment.
detailLevelMoreInformation:
Control the granularity of the generated task breakdown. The higher the detail, the more the complex task will be broken down into smaller, manageable steps.

• High Level - Provides a concise summary with only the main stages. Ideal for a quick, strategic overview.

• Medium Detail - Breaks down each stage into smaller, actionable sub-tasks, which will appear indented for clarity.

• Maximum Detail - Creates a comprehensive, step-by-step checklist with multiple levels of indented sub-tasks. Perfect for meticulous planning and execution.

• If scrolling feels unusual or stops working, simply toggle it off here.
